title: Ep127: 2nd Fife & Forfar Yeomanry - Operation Goodwood 1944
itunes:title: Ep127: 2nd Fife & Forfar Yeomanry - Operation Goodwood 1944
description:
Pete and Gary continue the saga of the 2nd Fife & Forfar Yeomanry, a WW2 tank unit, as they participate in Operation Goodwood, a key battle in the Normandy campaign. After you've listened to the podcast, read more about it in Peter Hart's new book, Burning Steel: A Tank Regiment at War 1939-1945, available online and at bookshops now!


Become a member to listen ad-free and receive special bonus content for only £2 per month: https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history
